textBeforeTable: View In iTunes Lightnin' Alley 1. Top Albums and Songs by Ernie Lancaster Full Bio Electric blues guitarist Ernie Lancaster played on albums by numerous artists throughout the '80s and '90s and released a solo album, Ernestly, in 1991. More than anything, Lancaster was perhaps best known as Root Boy Slim's guitarist in the Sex Change Band. He also played guitar for such artists as Ace Moreland, Kenny Neal, Lucky Peterson, Noble Watts, and Rev. Billy C. Wirtz.
